summary: This document is a set of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 2, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an out-count form, and an inmate roster, all standard prison operational records. The inmate roster lists one inmate, Jeffrey Epstein, with a note indicating 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the sole inmate on the roster with the registration number 78107-054, with an assignment note reading 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.

events.title: Prison Count and Roster Check
events.description: Administrative count and roster verification at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York. The inmate roster lists Jeffrey Epstein with a note regarding suicide or unassigned status.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 2, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the only inmate on the roster with registration number 78107-054.
Epstein's assignment on the roster is noted as 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (Suicide or Unassigned).
The documents are standard prison count and roster forms, providing a snapshot of administrative procedures on the eve of his death.
The total inmate count for the facility was recorded as 761, later verified as 760.
